help.title: Vampire Survivors
help.description: This is a library bot made for Vampire Survivors

fields.name: How To Use
fields.value:
Use `!itemname` To search for that item.
The default prefix is ! but it can be changed by an admin.

fields.name: Found an issue?
fields.value: We all make mistakes! Open an issue on the [GitHub](https://github.com/SHA65536/Vampire-Survivors-Bot) to let us know!

feedback.title: We no longer accept feedback with commands!
feedback.description: Instead open an issue on the [GitHub](https://github.com/SHA65536/Vampire-Survivors-Bot) to let us know!

whip.title: Whip
whip.description: This weapon can attack horizontally and pass through enemies.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Ignores duration and speed.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Hollow Heart** to make **Bloody Tear**

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Projectiles +1 
(3) Damage +5 
(4) Damage +5, Area +10% 
(5) Damage +5 
(6) Damage +5, Area +10% 
(7) Damage +5 
(8) Damage +5

bloody tear.title: Bloody Tear
bloody tear.description: Evolved version of the Whip. It can deal critical damage and absorb HP.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Requires the Hollow Heart for evolution.

magic wand.title: Magic Wand
magic wand.description: Its projectiles are fired at the nearest enemy.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Ignores duration.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Empty Tome** to make **Holy Wand**

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Fires 1 more projectile 
(3) Cooldown reduced by 0.2 
(4) Fires 1 more projectile 
(5) Damage up by 10 
(6) Fires 1 more projectile 
(7) Pierces 1 more enemy 
(8) Damage up by 10

holy wand.title: Holy Wand
holy wand.description: Evolved version of the Magic Wand. Its projectiles have no delay.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Requires the Empty Tome for evolution.

knife.title: Knife
knife.description: Quickly fires in a specific direction.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Ignores duration.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Bracer** to make **Thousand Edge**

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Fires 1 more projectile 
(3) Fires 1 more projectile, Damage + 5 
(4) Fires 1 more projectile 
(5) Pierces 1 more enemy 
(6) Fires 1 more projectile 
(7) Fires 1 more projectile, Damage + 5 
(8) Pierces 1 more enemy

thousand edge.title: Thousand Edge
thousand edge.description: Evolved version of the Knife. It can be used without delay.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Requires the Bracer for evolution.

axe.title: Axe
axe.description: Has high damage and high area scaling.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Ignores duration.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Candelabrador** to make **Death Spiral**

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Projectiles +1 
(3) Damage +20 
(4) Pierces +2 enemies 
(5) Projectiles +1 
(6) Damage +20 
(7) Pierces +2 enemies 
(8) Damage +20

death spiral.title: Death Spiral
death spiral.description: Evolved version of the Axe. It can pass through enemies.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Requires the Candelabrador for evolution.

cross.title: Cross
cross.description: Can aim at the nearest enemy and act like a boomerang.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Ignores duration.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Clover** to make **Heaven Sword**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Can be unlocked by finding a Rosary, which drops from breaking light sources.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Damage +10 
(3) Speed +25%, Area +10% 
(4) Projectiles +1 
(5) Damage +10 
(6) Speed +25, Area +10% 
(7) Projectiles +1 
(8) Damage +10

heaven sword.title: Heaven Sword
heaven sword.description: Evolved version of the Cross. It can deal critical damage.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Requires Clover for evolution.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Best with: speed, duration, area.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Spellbinder** to make **Unholy Vespers**

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Projectiles +1 
(3) Speed +30%, Area + 25% 
(4) Duration +0.5, Damage +10 
(5) Projectiles +1 
(6) Speed +30%, Area +25% 
(7) Duration +0.5, Damage +10 
(8) Projectiles +1

unholy vespers.title: Unholy Vespers
unholy vespers.description: Evolved version of the King Bible that endlessly orbits.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Requires Spellbinder for evolution.

fire wand.title: Fire Wand
fire wand.description: Can fire heavy damage at a random enemy.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Ignores duration.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Spinach** to make **Hellfire**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Can be unlocked by destroying 20 light sources.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Damage +10 
(3) Damage +10, speed + 20% 
(4) Damage +10 
(5) Damage +10, speed + 20% 
(6) Damage +10 
(7) Damage +10, speed + 20% 
(8) Damage +10

hellfire.title: Hellfire
hellfire.description: Evolved version of the Fire Wand. It can pass through enemies.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Requires Spinach for evolution.

peachone.title: Peachone
peachone.description: Creates a series of bombs on a circular area.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Area orbits clockwise around the player.

fields.name: Union
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Ebony Wing** at level 8 to make **Vandalier**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Can be unlocked by surviving for at least 10 minutes, using any character.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Projectiles +1, Area +40% 
(3) Projectiles +1, Damage +10% 
(4) Projectiles +1, Cooldown -0.3 
(5) Projectiles +1, Area +40 
(6) Projectiles +1, Damage +10% 
(7) Projectiles +1, Cooldown -0.3 
(8) Projectiles +1, Area +40%

ebony wings.description: Creates a series of bombs on a circular area.

fields.name: Notes

fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Peachone** at level 8 to make **Vandalier**

(7) Projectiles +1, Cooldown -0.3 
(8) Projectiles +1, Area +40%

vandalier.title: Vandalier
vandalier.description: Union of Peachone and Ebony Wings.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Unlocked by Getting both Peachone and Ebony Wings to level 8. Combined via a chest. Frees up a weapon slot and has 8 levels itself.

fields.value:
(1) Base

fields.value: Ignores speed.

runetracer.title: Runetracer
runetracer.description: Bounces around and passes through enemies.

fields.value: Does not evolve (yet...?)

(5) Damage +5, Speed + 20% 
(6) Damage +5, Duration + 0.3 
(7) Fires 1 more projectile

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Strikes at random enemies. Has an area of effect.

fields.value: Does not evolve (yet...?)

garlic.title: Garlic
garlic.description: Damages enemies that come within its radius.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Ignores cooldown, duration, speed.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Pummarola** to make **Soul Eater**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by finding five Floor Chickens.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Area +40%, Damage +2

(4) Area +20%, Damage +1

(8) Area +20%, Damage +2

soul eater.title: Soul Eater
soul eater.description: Evolved Version of Garlic. Steals hearts.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Requires Pummarola for evolution. Power increases when recovering HP.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Best with: Cooldown and Luck only.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Can be unlocked by surviving for at least 20 minutes, using any character.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Cooldown -10 
(3) 20% not to erase 
(4) Cooldown -10 
(5) 40% not to erase 
(6) Cooldown -10 
(7) 60% not to erase

clock lancet.description: Has a chance of freezing the enemies' time.

fields.name: Notes

(1) Base 
(2) Duration +1

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Required to evolve **Fire Wand** to **Hellfire**

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Required to evolve **Whip** to **Bloody Tear**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Survive 1 minute with any character.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Required to evolve **Garlic** to **Soul Eater**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Survive 5 minutes with **Gennaro**.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Required to evolve **Magic Wand** to **Holy Wand**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by holding 6 different weapons at once.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Get **Santa Water** to Level 4.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Required to evolve **Knife** to **Thousand Edge**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Get **King Bible** to Level 4.

spellbinder.title: Spellbinder
spellbinder.description: Increases duration of weapon effects by 10%.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Required to evolve **King Bible** to **Unholy Vespers**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Get **Runetracer** to Level 7.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Get **Magic Wand** to Level 7.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Reaching Level 5 with any character.

attractorb.title: Attractorb
attractorb.description: Character pickups items from further away.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Find a Vacuum (drops from breaking light sources)

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Required to evolve **Cross** to **Heaven Sword**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Find a Little Clover (drops from breaking light sources)

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Reaching Level 10 with any character.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by: Find a Stone Mask (Found in Library in top alcove sections rarely)

fields.value: Whip

fields.value: Attacks deal 10% more damage every 10 levels (max +50%) (Lvl 50)

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Free

fields.value: Magic Wand

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Purchased with 10 gold

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: Runetracer

fields.name: Ability
fields.value: Projectiles get 10% faster every 5 levels (max +30%) (Lvl 30)

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Purchasing with 100 gold (minimum value)

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: Knife

fields.name: Ability
fields.value: Permanent +1 projectile (all weapons)

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Purchasing with 600 gold (minimum value)

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: Fire Wand

fields.name: Ability
fields.value: Weapon cooldown is reduced by 5% every 10 levels. (max -15%) (Lvl 30)

fields.value: Getting Fire Wand to level 4 + purchasing with 750 gold

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: Lightning Ring

fields.name: Ability
fields.value: Permanent +30% area. Starts with temporarily reduced cooldown (so Lightning Ring kills faster)

fields.value: Getting Lightning Ring to level 4 + purchasing with 750 gold

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: Garlic

fields.name: Ability

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Getting Garlic to level 7 + purchasing with 800 gold.

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: Bone

fields.name: Ability
fields.value: Gets more projectiles every 20 levels (max+3) (Lvl 60)

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Defeating a total of 3000 skeletons

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: ||Ebony Wings||

fields.name: Ability
fields.value: ||Permanent +100% Luck, -33 Max Health, -10% MoveSpeed, -10% Area, -50% Speed, -10% Duration, +10% Cooldown.||

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: ||Typing 'x-x1viiq' in main menu.||

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: King Bible

fields.name: Ability
fields.value: Permanent +40% duration, +40% projectile speed. -40% Moving speed.

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Earn 5000 coins in a single run.

fields.name: Starting Weapon
fields.value: Santa Water

fields.name: Ability
fields.value: Permanent +0.5 HP/s and +30 Max Health. Starts with temporary area bonus.

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Heal a total of 1000 health.
